text:
Lucky Philip Dube (pronounced "duu-beh"; 3 August 1964 – 18 October 2007) was a South African reggae musician and Rastafarian. He recorded over 27 albums in English, Zulu and Afrikaans over a span of 12 years.
Death.
Dube was shot and killed in Johannesburg on 18 October 2007 at the age of 43.
